column5: Welcome to The Suites, where Austin living meets Classic Hollywood. The Suites combine impeccable accommodations, stellar surroundings, and first class customer service. When staying here life is filled with upscale amenities and perks. The amazing location puts you near downtown hot spots, retail, restaurants and night life. When it is time to unwind, head to one of our resort style pools complete with cabanas, sun loungers and outdoor TVâ€™s.
